quotations.label: Quotations
quotations.comment:
Cart2Quote (Version 5.1.2) Provided by Ophirah | E-commerce Projects

For documentation and support visit cart2quote.zendesk.com or contact support@cart2quote.com

licence_key.label: Licence Key
licence_key.comment:
Don't set more than one license.
Buy a License or Compare Versions.

active_c2q_tmpl.label: Use Built-in Template Files
active_c2q_tmpl.comment: Set to NO to disable the front-end functionality of Cart2Quote or when manually copying Cart2Quote template and layout information into a custom theme.

layout_update_detailpage_activated.label: Product Page Activation
layout_update_detailpage_activated.comment: Show or hide the add to quote button on the product detail page.

layout_update_listgrid_activated.label: Category Page Activation
layout_update_listgrid_activated.comment: Show or hide the add to quote button on the product list/grid page.

ajax_add.label: Ajax Add to Quote
ajax_add.comment: Opens Ajax popup when adding product to Quote Request.

layout_disable_all_order_references.label: Hide Order References
layout_disable_all_order_references.comment: Hide order buttons and references on quote submit page. To disable order functionality please use Not2order.

layout_disable_trier_option.label: Disable Qty Tier Request
layout_disable_trier_option.comment: Hide option to request quotes for multiple quantities per item.

disable_exist_account_check.label: Registration Mode
disable_exist_account_check.comment: Cart2Quote will check the form for a known emailaddres. When a login is not required for existing users, the user will also not be logged in automatically after a quote is submitted.

hide_shipping_quote.label: Hide Shipping Quote for Non-logged in Users

state.label: State
state.comment: For some countries such as Canada and the United States Magento is preconfigured to require the customer to specify the state.

quote_form_customization.label: Custom Fields (Beta)
quote_form_customization.comment: Cart2Quote Enterprise license or higher required. (Upgrade)

send_linked_sale_bcc.label: Send BCC to Linked Sales Representative
send_linked_sale_bcc.comment: The Magento Admin User email of the linked sales representative will be used. Cart2Quote Enterprise license and higher required. (Upgrade)

proposal_reminder.label: Reminder Proposal Template
proposal_reminder.comment: Select email to be send. Enterprise edition only.

pdf.label: Enable PDF Proposal
pdf.comment: The price proposal will also be attached as PDF.

short_desc.label: Add Product Short Description Text to PDF

doc.label: Enable Standard Document
doc.comment: Upload any file as default attachment to the proposal email. (i.e. Terms and Conditions) NOTE: Some providers limit the size of emails.

fields.expirtime_proposal: Default Expiration Time Proposals text 39892123 20 1 1 1 In days. <input type="hidden" value="201151429" class="article_id"/> qquoteadv/adminhtml_system_config_form_tooltipfield

send_reminder.label: Default Reminder Notice
send_reminder.comment: In days. Set to "0" to disable this feature. This notice is available in the Cart2Quote Enterprise edition. (Upgrade)

auto_proposal.label: Auto Proposal
auto_proposal.comment: Price proposals are send automatically, based on standard catalog prices including price tiers. Cart2Quote Business license and higher required. (Upgrade)

quoteconfirmation.label: Lock Proposal
quoteconfirmation.comment: Proposal items cannot be removed or added from quote via the shopping cart.

itemprice.label: Show Items Price
itemprice.comment: Disable to hide individual item prices in PDF, email and customer dashboard by default. (Only show totals)

adjustment.label: Show Quote Adjustment to Customers
adjustment.comment: Total quote discount will be visible for customers in the Proposal total block.

profit.label: Allow Negative Profit
profit.comment: When enabled quote proposals can be sent with negative profit.

qquoteadv_remark.label: Set Standard (Fixed) Remark with Proposal
qquoteadv_remark.comment: Add remark that appears in new proposal email and in the quote proposal PDF.

fields.prefix: Default Quote Prefix text 10a 1 1 1 <input type="hidden" value="201151559" class="article_id"/> qquoteadv/adminhtml_system_config_form_tooltipfield

pad_length.label: Pad Length
pad_length.comment: Desired number length without the prefix. Set to 0 to not add leading zeros to doc number.

auto_assign_rotate.label: Assign Sales Representative
auto_assign_rotate.comment: New quotes are assigned automatically, rotating the admin users in the auto assign role below.

auto_assign_role.label: Auto Assign Role
auto_assign_role.comment: Admin users with this role and with an active status are used to assign new quote request to based on rotation.

auto_assign_previous.label: Sticky Sales Representative
auto_assign_previous.comment: Assign quotes from existing customers to the sales representative who is linked to the previous request from the customer. This overwrites the auto assign role.

auto_assign_login.label: Assign Quote to Logged in Sales Representative
auto_assign_login.comment:
When an admin user is logged in the backend and creates a quote in the frontend then this user is assigned to the quote by default. This transcends the sticky and rotation assignment.
Cart2Quote Business license and higher required. (Upgrade)

limit_available_salesrep.label: Limit available Sales Representatives
limit_available_salesrep.comment: When enabled, you can select and exclude the sales reps that can be assigned to existing and new quote requests.

beta.label: Beta Features
beta.comment: Overview of current beta features and to submit feedback, go to the Beta Forum.

default_cart2quote_attribute_value.label: Default 'Allowed to Quote Mode' Value for New Products

force_log.label: Enable Email Logging
force_log.comment: Enable logging when you have issues sending emails. Make sure Magento logging is enabled.

upload_folder.label: Subfolder for File Uploads
upload_folder.comment: Give subdirectory name to use within store media folder to store file uploads. Default is 'qquoteadv', without trailing slash.

redirect_to_quotation.label: After Adding a Product Redirect to Quotation List

followup.label: Follow-up in Grid
followup.comment: Follow-up button in quotation grid will filter quotes to this setting.

customer_name_select.label: Customer Name Dropdown
customer_name_select.comment: Creates select box in quote overview. May result in memory problems for large amount of customers.

calculate_quote_totals_on_load.label: Calculate Totals on Page Load
calculate_quote_totals_on_load.comment: Important Setting this option to yes will increase page load time.

force_original_product_price.label: Force Original Product Price on Edit Products
force_original_product_price.comment:
When an admin edits the products on a quote, the original price can be overwritten by the custom price. This options disables that.
NOTE: It uses the default product price and doesn't use any vat/tax/multi-currency calculation.

link_auto_login.label: Auto User Login
link_auto_login.comment: Adds links to proposal email that enable automatic user login - only available in Business and Enterprise edition.

auto_confirm.label: Use Auto Confirm Proposal
auto_confirm.comment: The checkout button in the proposal email, links directly to the checkout page. Select 'No' if you want customers to first visit the customer dashboard.

checkout_alternative_url.label: Alternative Checkout URL
checkout_alternative_url.comment: Enter alternative checkout url. NOTE: When using this feature, the quote items will NOT be placed in the shopping cart.

checkout_alternative_email.label: Proposal Email with Alternative Checkout Link
checkout_alternative_email.comment: Select email template to be used when the alternative checkout is used for the quote proposal.

confirmed_alternate.label: Checkout quotes with accepted status
confirmed_alternate.comment: When enabled a Quote with state accepted can still be checked out. This is a beta setting. Use at your own risk!

mass_update_cart2quote_attribute_ranges.label: Product Id Ranges
mass_update_cart2quote_attribute_ranges.comment: Be sure to save if you have made any changes before you update.

quick_quote_mode.label: Enable Quick Quote
quick_quote_mode.comment: When enabled the quote request will directly be send from the product detail page.

create_support_ticket.label: Create Support Ticket
create_support_ticket.comment:
When opening a support ticket, please do include the following information:

  • Your order number and Magento version number
  • Steps to reproduce the issue in your store
  • FTP/SSH login as well as Magento admin access (if relevant)
  • Screenshots with notes describing the issue
    • Create a support ticket here!

report_a_bug.label: Report a Bug
report_a_bug.comment:
When creating a bug report, please do include the following information:

  • Steps to reproduce the issue in your store
  • Screenshots with notes describing the issue
    • Report a bug here!
